items.name: FS-38 Eradicator
items.description: First deployed in the mines of Cyberstan, where it offered protection against explosions in the hydrogen-rich caverns.

passive.name: Fortified
passive.description:
Further reduces recoil when crouching or prone by 30%. 
 Provides 50% resistance to explosive damage.

items.name: B-27 Fortified Commando
items.description: This armor set first appeared in the music video for the summer anthem 'Our Love is Like Liberty (Indestructible)'.
